metadata.description: The world of monsters is powered by the screams of human children, and Sulley and Mike are the top scaring team at Monsters, Inc., the biggest scream processing plant in Monstropolis. But when a human child named Boo crosses over into their world, it could mean the end of their careers! Sulley and Mike must sneak her back to her room without getting caught, but accidentally uncover a terrible secret hidden in the heart of Monsters, Inc.
metadata.name: Disney Manga: Monsters Inc.
